name: Notifications
description:
'Notifications'... What more is there to say?

Only local notifications are currently supported so no remote push-notifications for now.

Notifications can be given a title & description to be displayed on the notification along with a userinfo table for use by your project. All notifications much specify the delay in seconds before they will be displayed.

API (All functions follow 'Notifications.'):

- setup(function(hasPermission))
    Must be called first. Will present the notifications permission dialog if necessary.

- scheduleNotification(title, desc, delay, userinfo)
    Schedules a notification to be sent after the specified number of seconds. 
    Returns the identifier of the notification.

- cancelNotifications(identifier | [identifier])
    Cancels notifications matching the provided identifiers.

- cancelAllNotifications()
    Cancels all notifications scheduled by the current project.

- getPendingNotifications(function(notifications))
    Returns to the callback a key-value table with notification identifiers as keys and userinfo tables as values.
